target: Any time, and you have a great day as well!
context: <user> Hi there, I need to find a hotel - a guesthouse to be precise. I don't need internet so don't worry about that <system> 24 guesthouses fit your criteria. Do you know what side of town you're wanting to be in or the pricerange? <user> Id like a guesthouse rated 3 stars. <system> There are 4 guesthouses that meet your needs, 2 in the north and 1 each in the west and south. Would one of these interest you? <user> I will take the one in the south as long as they have a room for 4 available for 5 nights. <system> I will be happy to make your reservation, what day will you be arriving? <user> book it for 4 people and 5 nights starting from thursday. <system> Booking was successful.Reference number is : RVSD43KC . what else can i do for you?<user> I'd like to find an expensive restaurant in the west to celebrate our family. <system> What type of food would you prefer?<user> I would like chinese. <system> I do not have an expensive Chinese restaurant in the West. Can I find you something different?<user> What about greek food? <system> I don't see any expensive greek restaurants in the west either. We do have British, European and Indian options available, though. Would you like information on one of those?<user> Okay, let's try one that serves British food. <system> i would suggest graffiti<user> OK, that sounds good. The same group of people will be dining on the same day that we arrive. Can you book a table for 15:30? <system> Booking was successful. The table will be reserved for 15 minutes. Reference number is : ZCJZ13XO . What else can I do for you today?<user> Great. Thank you. Now I need a taxi. <system> Okay and what day do you need the taxi for?<user> I will need the taxi the same day. <system> Sure, where would you like to be picked up from? Also where will you need to be dropped off and what time?<user> I would like to go from the restaurant to the hotel. <system> Your booking is completed. A red Honda, contact number 07441837045 will pick you up in front of the restaurant at 17:30. Does this time work for you?<user> Yes the time works for me . That will be all thanks and have a great day. <system>
